Title: Padres focused on making Ha-seong Kim comfortable, with help from countryman
Description: In part because of that shower and all Park did in the U.S. afterward, as well as the passage of time that has in many ways created a smaller world, new Padres infielder Ha-seong Kim is set up to have a chance at a smoother transition and quicker success.
Author: San Diego Union-Tribune on MSN.com
